headline: Senior Frontend Engineer, Lead | React, React Native, TypeScript, Node.js | I Help Teams Transform Front-end Codebases with Clean, Maintainable Patterns, Boosting Productivity by 30%
summary:
Senior Full Stack Developer and Engineering Team Lead specializing in React.js and React Native, with a proven track record in architecting complex web and mobile applications while managing cross-functional development teams.

Experienced in spearheading technology adoption strategies, including TypeScript, automated code quality, testing and AI development tooling. Proficient in both frontend and backend development, with expertise in Node.js, Express, and various databases.

Skilled in implementing best practices such as Atomic Design, CI/CD pipelines, and monorepo architectures, while mentoring junior developers and fostering a culture of technical excellence. Adept at delivering high-impact commercial projects that drive organizational success.

**Technical Skills:**

**Languages:** TypeScript, JavaScript, HTML, CSS3
**Frontend:** React.js, Next.js, Angular.js
**Mobile Dev:** React Native, Expo, Android, iOS
**UI Libraries:** Ant Design, Material UI, Mantine
**Styling:** Styled Components, CSS Modules, Sass
**Backend:** Node.js, Express, Firebase
**State Management:** Redux Toolkit, React Context, React Hooks
**API:** GraphQL, RESTful APIs
**Design Principles:** Atomic Design, Clean Code
**Databases:** MongoDB Atlas, PostgreSQL, Redis
**Build Tools:** Webpack, Vite, Parcel, Babel
**Code Quality:** ESLint, Prettier, Husky
**Testing:** Jest, Playwright, Puppeteer, Storybook
**Mobile Testing:** Detox
**CI/CD:** GitHub Actions, Docker, AWS, Vercel, Supabase
**Extension Dev:** Chrome Extensions, VS Code Extensions
**Monorepos:** NX, Turbo Repo, PNPM + Yarn Workspaces
**AI Integration:** OpenAI API, Claude API, Vector Databases

**Key Projects:**

• **Scala Cloud Platform:** Design digital signs using our Photoshop-like browser based design tool. Manage and administer sign hardware, users and signage content organization wide on our platform. (React, TS, Node)

• **StoryTime: AI Audiobook Creator:** Multi-character stories brought to life with AI voices and voice clones (Next.js)

• **AI Context Generator:** Extracts a file tree and files into your clipboard to feed AI context (VSCode Extension)

• **We Learn Music Together:** Mobile Game + SaaS Platform that teaches toddlers Music Theory (React Native, Next.js)

• **Code Companion: AI Unit Test Writer:** Generates full coverage unit tests and runs them in the browser (React)

• **Cheddar: Balance Forecasting for Personal Finance:** Plan your financial future (React Native, TS, Node, Express)
location: King of Prussia, Pennsylvania, United States
